thread.title: Toscana Energy Confirms Closing of Royalty Revenue Acquisition
thread.title_full: Toscana Energy Confirms Closing of Royalty Revenue Acquisition

title: Toscana Energy Confirms Closing of Royalty Revenue Acquisition
text:
Toscana Energy Confirms Closing of Royalty Revenue Acquisition August 10, 2015 11:55 ET | Source: Toscana Energy Income Corporation 
CALGARY, Alberta, Aug. 10,   Toscana Energy Income Corporation ("Toscana Energy") (TSX: TEI ) is pleased to announce that it continues to build its royalty revenue stream through the acquisition of an $11,500,000 Gross Overriding Royalty ( "GORR" ) over a five (5) well drilling program in northwestern Alberta. Toscana Energy's GORR will be generated via drilling infill locations over a proven Montney reserve base. Royalty rates will range from 8 -12% over these wells. 
About Toscana Energy Income Corporation 
Toscana Energy is a conventional oil and gas producer with the mandate to acquire high quality, long life oil and gas assets including royalties, non-operated working interests and unitized production for yield and capital appreciation. Toscana Energy is managed by Sprott Toscana through Toscana Energy Corporation. Sprott Toscana is a member of the Sprott Group of Companies. 
For further information, please visit our website at www.sprott-toscana.com or contact: 
Joseph S. Durante, Chief Executive Officer 
Tel: (403) 410-6793 
Source: Toscana Energy Income Corporation Related Articles
